title: TimeOfDayEnum
description: Time of day classifications for raga performance. Based on traditional Ashta Prahar system with modern equivalents.

oneOf.description: Pratah kaal - dawn period, approximately 4-7 AM
Madhyaahn - late morning/midday, approximately 10 AM-1 PM
Sandhya kaal - evening twilight, approximately 4-7 PM
Pradosh kaal - early night, approximately 7-10 PM
Nisha kaal - deep night, approximately 10 PM-1 AM
Ardha-ratri - late night/early dawn, approximately 1-4 AM
No specific time restriction - suitable for any time of day
